definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Russia, a major oil producer, is unlikely to embrace any ambitious emissions reductions.
sentences.chinese: 产油大国俄罗斯不太可能欢迎任何大幅减排计划。

sentences.english: On the whole, average weekly hours are far below their pre-recession level.
sentences.chinese: 整体而言，周平均工作时间比起衰退前大幅下滑。

sentences.english: After soil improvement, the yield of this land has increased greatly.
sentences.chinese: 改土后，这块地的产量大幅提升。

sentences.english: Your chances of being dissected just declined dramatically.
sentences.chinese: 你被解剖的概率已经大幅度下降。

sentences.english: Like any gemstone, take care not to subject your amethyst jewellery to sharp blows.
sentences.chinese: 就像任何宝石，注意不要受到冲击大幅贵紫晶首饰。

sentences.english: Even so, other reports showed big drops in housing sales in May. That followed the end of a homebuyer's tax credit.
sentences.chinese: 即便如此，其他报告显示五月房价大幅度下跌。

sentences.english: China's energy policies will also boost demand for uranium.
sentences.chinese: 中国能源政策也会大幅提高铀的需求。

sentences.english: “ said Xiao Gang, the chairman of the bank of China that ranks the third in market value in Chinese banking sector, “But the possibility of the non-performing loans’ rapid increase is very slim.”
sentences.chinese: 但我认为，银行业不良贷款大幅增加的几率很小。

sentences.english: Hybrid fibers can improve impact strength of concrete near 7 times.
sentences.chinese: 混合纤维可以大幅提高混凝土抗冲击性能近7倍。

sentences.english: The first five months of 2008, the second-hand car totally maintained large increase of business volume.
sentences.chinese: 2008年前五个月，二手车累计交易量大幅增长。

sentences.english: Tumbling this price positions significantly increase potential null layout has been positive.
sentences.chinese: 今价重挫持仓量大幅递增，追势空单布局甚为积极。

sentences.english: ' Although the cost of shipping goods from Nanjing and other mainland airports has fallen dramatically.
sentences.chinese: 尽管从南京及其它内地机场运输货物的费用大幅下降。

sentences.english: It may raise the strength of the coarse grained soil.
sentences.chinese: 由于咬合力的存在，使粗粒土的强度大幅度提高。

sentences.english: In the present environment of market economy, we are happy to see that the situation in our nation has improved significantly.
sentences.chinese: 第三段说现在的情况已大幅改善。

sentences.english: Of course, the search that confiscates building guaranty about the bank also is in grow considerably.
sentences.chinese: 当然，关于银行没收房屋抵押的搜索也在大幅增长。

sentences.english: Gives high earners big breaks on the payroll tax.
sentences.chinese: 给予高收入者较大幅度的收入税减免。

definition: to decline/to drop/to fall/to go down/to decrease
to slow down/to ease up/to abate/slowdown/downturn
to rise again after a fall/to pick up/rally (stock market etc)
to fall back/to return to low level after a rise (in water level, price etc)
to clamber up/(of prices etc) to rise
